title: example-component
description: An example component with implementations of OIH actions.

getNewAndUpdatedObjectsPolling.title: Get New and Updated Objects Polling
getNewAndUpdatedObjectsPolling.description: Poll for new and/or updated objects

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to poll for

startTime.label: Start Time
startTime.note: Beginning time to start polling from (inclusive) in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to the beginning of time

endTime.label: End Time
endTime.note: End time to stop polling at (inclusive) in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Defaults to never

sizeOfPollingPage.label: Size of Polling Page
sizeOfPollingPage.note: Indicates the size of pages to be fetched (positive integer). Defaults to 1000

singlePagePerInterval.label: Fetch a single page per flow
singlePagePerInterval.note: If the number of changed records exceeds the page size, wait until the next flow to fetch the next page

pollConfig.label: Time stamp field to poll on
pollConfig.prompt: Please select a Time stamp field to poll on. Default: Time Updated

upsert.title: Upsert Object by Unique Criteria
upsert.description: Create or Update the selected object

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to upsert

upsertCriteria.label: Upsert Criteria
upsertCriteria.prompt: Please select the unique field with which you want to upsert the object

lookupObject.title: Lookup Object by Unique Criteria
lookupObject.description: Lookup an object (at most 1) by Unique Criteria

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to look up

lookupCriteria.label: Lookup Criteria
lookupCriteria.prompt: Please select the unique field with which you want to lookup the object

allowCriteriaToBeOmitted.label: Allow criteria to be omitted
allowCriteriaToBeOmitted.note: If selected, the lookup criteria field is not required

allowZeroResults.label: Allow zero results
allowZeroResults.note: When zero objects are found the empty object will be emitted instead of an error

waitForObjectToExist.label: Wait for object to exist
waitForObjectToExist.note: When no results are found apply rebounds and wait until object exists

linkedObjectToPopulate.label: Linked Object to populate
linkedObjectToPopulate.note: Select which parent or child object to include in result

deleteObject.title: Delete Object by Unique Criteria
deleteObject.description: Delete an object by Unique Criteria

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to look up

deleteCriteria.label: Delete Criteria
deleteCriteria.prompt: Please select the unique field with which you want to delete the object
